title: Cannot see the whole screen during gamplay
body: So, I joined a match and when it finally loaded, I couldn't see over half the screen. I could see some of the bottom right corner, but that's all I could see. Any ideas how to fix this?

replies.body: Missing half the screen is pretty weird, and I suspect a bad driver could be the cause.  To help rule out some possibilities and make sure your pc is in good health, go through each instruction in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  Test it in a custom and let me know the results.
